code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Contact.css';import linkedin from'./assets/linkedin.png';import email from'./assets/email.png';import emailjs from'emailjs-com';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',message:''});const[isSent,setIsSent]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('service_ty4f7xj','service_ty4f7xj',e.target,'umAsYB4JTgRP-RiWP').then(result=>{console.log("Message sent successfully!");setIsSent(true);setError(null);setFormData({name:'',email:'',message:''});}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error sending message");setError("Failed to send message. Please try agian later.");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"contact transition-fade",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"page-title",children:"Get in Contact!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"external-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"external-btn",href:"mailto:mendoza.a01@outlook.com",target:"_blank",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"contact-logo",src:email,alt:"email picture"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"mendoza.a01@outlook.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"external-btn",href:"https://linkedin.com/in/antonio-mendoza01/",target:"_blank",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"contact-logo",src:linkedin,alt:"linkedin button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"LinkedIn"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"form-title",children:"Or send a message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Your Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Your Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",value:formData.message,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Your Message",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"send-btn",children:"Send"})]}),isSent&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"success-message",children:"Your message has been sent!"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error})]})]})});};export default Contact;
